topics.body:
Okay befor Lee decided to run off to thhe Digital World, he e-mailed his dad. Because he was afraid his dad was gonna stop him from going. I wonder how the e-mail was written...
[spoiler]"Yo old guy, heading off to the Digital world to be a sick badass. You wanna come with? Too bad shitlord! Deuces!"[/spoiler]

$114.99!!!!!

Yes! I mean EVERYTHING YOU HATE.

DOWN TO THE WIRE.

Damn, Damn I need something to wash it out.

It tastes like the rotting bodies of the damned.
